context: Hi there. I am well and yourself?
I'm doing good. What kind of movies are you into?
I'm looking to watch a movie like The Goonies (1985). Know of any good ones?
Sure. You have great taste. That is a classic. If you like the Corey's, one of my favorites is The Lost Boys (1987) . It's not exactly like The Goonies (1985) but it has funny moments.
Okay, I've heard of it but I will take your recommendation. Thank you I also really enjoyed Stand by Me (1986)
resp: Gremlins (1984) is a good campy movie from that period. It is silly but fun.
